title: Jessie J shares boyfriend Channing Tatum's adorable nickname: 'Missing this cuddle machine'
text:
CLOSE They made us fall head over heels, then they broke our hearts. A previous version of this video misidentified Jenna Dewan. USA TODAY

Jessie J is missing her main squeeze.

The "Domino" singer, 31, took to her Instagram Story Wednesday to share a sweet, fresh-faced photo selfie of herself posing with boyfriend Channing Tatum, 39, in a tropical location.

In addition to sharing the rare shot of the lovebirds together, Jessie J appeared to disclose one of their favorite activities. "Missing this cuddle machine," she wrote.

The British singer and Tatum's reported romance made headlines in October 2018, months after he split from Jenna Dewan after nearly nine years of marriage.

The couple have remained coy about their blossoming relationship but have started to open up on social media. (Before Tatum deleted his Instagram account, of course.)

'Let’s stay focused':Jessie J dodges questions about Channing Tatum's 'Magic Mike'

'I didn’t know life without' him:Jenna Dewan 'just gutted' after Channing Tatum split

Jessie J performs at Palco Sunset at Cidade do Rock, Rio de Janero, Brazil. (Photo: Wagner Meier, Getty Images)

In November, Tatum gushed about Jessie J's performance at a London show.

"This woman just poured her heart out on stage at Royal Albert Hall," the "Magic Mike" actor wrote alongside a photo from the show in which he tagged Jessie J.

Tatum continued to praise the artist, adding: "Whoever was there got to witness something special. Wow."

Instagram-official alert! Channing Tatum gushes over girlfriend Jessie J's show

Channing Tatum and singer Jessie J have kept their reported romance out of the limelight. (Photo: Jordan Strauss, Invision/AP)

For her 31st birthday in March, he also posted a swoon-worthy message.

"Wishing you the happiest day filled with all the love and all the light," he captioned a black-and-white picture shared to Instagram. "You came into this world on this day and lit it on fire. You have blessed our eyes, our ears, our hearts and our lives. So thank you for just being you. You are so very special. Happy birthday Baby."

Jessie J has yet to post Tatum on her main Instagram account.

Contributing: Erin Jensen

description: Jessie J took to her Instagram Story to share a fresh-faced selfie of herself posing with boyfriend Channing Tatum. She called him "cuddle machine."
